default.text: it's... silent in here, I like it :)
I can't believe this happened, this sucks!
nothing can stop me from getting beer, we have to break out!
I believe there is no way how we can break free from confinement now

choices.text: let's ask one of these blue dressed men for a bread, I'm still hungry
I just have to bend those cell bars and we're as good as free.
you're all crazy, just ask one of our cellmates for alcohol, and we'll survive until we get the f*** out of here
